input.sentences: the bands were loud and carried throughout the stadium .
we were far away but we still enjoyed the show .
there were thousands of people in the crowd .
act after act came out on stage .
night fell | but the lights and music did n't stop .
output.sentences: We started our night watching them perform in the club.
There were so many people in the streets.
They performed one hit after another.
I will never forget this night.
